name: CORTICOSTEROIDS
breadcrumbs: 12.3.1 Drugs for oral ulceration and inflammation
side-effects:
Side-effects occasional exacerbation of local infection; thrush
or other candidal infections
doses:
adult and child over 12 years, 1 lozenge 4 times daily, allowed
to dissolve slowly in the mouth in contact with the ulcer; child under 12 years, only on medical advice
